messages.message: In Build on https://aihub.preprod.instabase.com, I can’t figure out how to save clean prompts / UDFs. I don’t see a “Save” button, and if I tap “Back”, it’s not autosaved. Is this a bug or did I miss something?
Can you share a screenshot? When editing a clean custom function you should see a “Save and run” button at the bottom after you make changes
Here’s a video for adding a clean custom function. I hit the ‘save and run’ button, but it seems like it’s not actually saving
For a clean prompt, all I see is this textbox and below it “No results to display”. It also doesn’t autosave this after I hit “Back”
Can you check what feature flags you have enabled in your account settings? I suspect you might have autosave enabled, which is still in development
yea that was it. Turning that off fixed it :slightly_smiling_face:
